Nodes.Title: Flight Search
Nodes.Name: searchExchange
Nodes.Description: Perform an exchange search of itineraries with the search criteria in a JSON format. The response contains a list of itineraries with fare offerings and detailed price breakdown.

Parameters.Name: body
Parameters.Description: JSON request with exchange search criteria.

body.title: AirSearchExchange
body.description: JSON request with exchange search criteria.

searchCriteria.title: AirSearch
searchCriteria.description: JSON representation of the search parameters.

currency.description: Currency that overrides default currency used in search. Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217, or FFCURRENCY for points/miles.

awardBooking.description: Flag indicating if search result should be obtained for an award booking.

promoCodes.description: Promo codes associated with the trip/passengers.

from.title: Location
from.description: Location information. Code may be city or code.

useNearbyLocations.description: Flag indicating if we should use nearby location search.

to.title: Location
to.description: Location information. Code may be city or code.

useNearbyLocations.description: Flag indicating if we should use nearby location search.

date.description: Specific date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

plusMinusDays.description: Number of the alternate pricing days that will be shown in the matrix before and after the selected date. In the format plus/minus 2 days for the matrix 5x5.

pointOfSale.description: Point of Sale denotes the Country from which Sale happens. ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1.

trendIndicator.description: Flag indicating multiple visits to the website.

preferredOperatingCarrier.description: Operating carrier code to be sent to shopping as the preferred one.

segmentsToExchange.description: Specifies segments for an exchange when exchangeType is set as segment. Segments should be specified as a list of numbers starting from 1. For itinerary DFW-FRA-KRK, KRK-DFW segment indexes will be: DFW-FRA 1, FRA-KRK 2, KRK-DFW 3.

Nodes.Title: Get Award Details
Nodes.Name: getAwardDetails
Nodes.Description: Gets Award payment details like: minimum and maximum amount of award points could be use to pay for the trip and how it can be split between price components. It's required to be log in.

Nodes.Title: Get Dynamic Currency Offers
Nodes.Name: retrieveDCCOffer
Nodes.Description: Used when the currency of the booking is different than the currency on which the passenger's credit card is based. It checks if the Credit Card is eligible for the Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC), informs the Payment Web Service that the Digital Connect requests for the dynamic currency conversion offers and retrieves possible DCC (Dynamic Currency Conversion) offers.

currency.description: Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.

payment.description: List of preferred payment/payments for the selected offering.

cancelURL.description: Context parameter - cancel URL.

payerId.description: ID of the payer needed for 2nd PayPal request.

accountNumber.description: Bank account number. Required for ELV transaction.

countryCode.description: Code of the country where the bank is located (two letters ISO country code like : https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1).

sortCode.description: Six digit code that identifies the bank and the branch where account is held. Required for ELV transaction.

bankName.description: The name of account holder's bank.

allOf.description: Code of payment outside of the Digital Connect when using for example BPC.

declinedURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when it has been declined.

errorURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when during the process an error has been encountered.

cancelURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when the operation has been cancelled.

expirationDate.description: Credit Card expiration date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

installmentId.description: Installment ID. Used when installment source in payment options service is PAYMENT_PROVIDER. It should not be present when installment source in payment options service is CONFIGURATION.

bankName.description: Installment bank name. Used when installment source in payment options service is CONFIGURATION. It should not be present when installment source in payment options service is PAYMENT_PROVIDER.

months.description: Selected amount of monthly installments (available options are configurable). Used when installment source in payment options service is CONFIGURATION. It should not be present when installment source in payment options service is PAYMENT_PROVIDER.

countryCode.description: Phone country code (ISO country code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Country_code).

  --url '{% case environment %}{% when 'default' %}https://{% if config["host_and_port"] != nil %}{{ config["host_and_port"] | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}{% else %}{% endif %}/{% if config["api_context_path"] != nil %}{{ config["api_context_path"] | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}{% else %}{% endif %}{% when 'mock' %}https://f7odr7msbeqckh59c-mock.stoplight-proxy.io{% endcase %}/pnr/exchange/products/seats' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer {{ config["AccessToken"] | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}'\
  -H 'application-id: {{ config["application-id"] | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}'\
  -H 'Accept: application/json' \
  -d 'jipcc={% if config["storefront"] == nil %}STOREFRONT_ID{% else %}{{ config["storefront"] | url_encode | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}{% endif %}' \
  -d 'execution={% if config["execution"] == nil %}EXECUTION_ID{% else %}{{ config["execution"] | url_encode | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}{% endif %}'{% if call["args"]["promoSSRs"] != nil %}{% for this in call["args"]["promoSSRs"] %} \
  -d 'promoSSRs={% if this != nil %}{{ this | json | url_encode | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}{% else %}{% endif %}'{% endfor %}{% endif %}

Nodes.Title: Recalculate Product Prices
Nodes.Name: refreshProducts
Nodes.Description: Recalculates products data based on given context

awardSwitchState.title: AwardSwitchState
awardSwitchState.description:
Defines products prices mode: CASH or POINTS. For CASH, products breakdown returned by service will be in cash.
For POINTS, products breakdown will be recalculated to points, if user is logged in and has sufficient balance.
Can be used in B2C flow. Switching to POINTS does not change flow to RBE.

airCustomPricing.title: AirCustomPricing
airCustomPricing.description: Custom pricing details for selected itinerary supporting custom discount at itinerary part/itinerary level, tax override and endorsement text addition to booking.

endorsement.description: Endorsement text which will be added to the booking.

items.title: Tax
items.description: JSON representation of the tax override parameter.

code.description: Code associated with the tax where the tax amount will be overridden.

amount.description: Tax amount which will override the current tax.

items.title: AirItineraryDiscount
items.description: Discount amount/percentage or fixed base fare for the selected itinerary.

origin.description: Origin airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

destination.description: Destination airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

departure.description: Departure date time (timestamp in the format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS).

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: JSON representation of the select flights discount parameter.

baseFare.description: Fixed base fare (excluding taxes) which will replace the original fare.

allOf.description: Fixed base fare (excluding taxes) which will replace the original fare.

amount.description: Discount amount to be applied for the fare.

percentage.description: Discount percentage to be applied for the fare.

reprice.description:
Until now pricing was supported on select flights and in purchase.
This new property (value set to: true/false) in PUT method will allow additional re-price before user enters payment page or any other step in flow.
If it is not provided it will be treated as "false".

Nodes.Title: Offload Passenger
Nodes.Name: offLoadPassenger
Nodes.Description: Offload - an action that changes VCR status from CKIN to OK, in order to give passengers an option to initiate an exchange or refund process, when the originally booked and checked in flight is under IROP situation (e.g. flight is cancelled or delayed).

Parameters.Name: body
Parameters.Description: First flight segment that is being Offloaded.

body.title: OffLoadPassengerRequest
body.description: First flight segment that is being Offloaded.

origin.description: Origin of the segment where Offload will be started (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

flightNumber.description: Segment's flight number where Offload will be started.

departureDate.description: Flight's departure date when Offload will be started.

Parameters.Name: body
Parameters.Description: Profile data required to create a new user profile

body.title: CreateProfileRequest
body.description: Profile data required to create a new user profile

prefix.title: Prefix2
prefix.description: Passenger prefix or title, accepts lower and upper case letters (prefix values read from pnr will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

suffix.title: Suffix2
suffix.description: Passenger suffix, accepts lower and upper case letters (suffix values read from the PNR will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

dateOfBirth.description: Passenger's date of birth in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

redressNumber.description: Redress number is issued to customers as part the TSA's Secure Flight program to speed identification and security clearance. More information available at www.tsa.gov/stakeholders/secure-flight-program.

countryCode.description: Phone country code (ISO country code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Country_code).

street1.description: First line of street address specifying building number, street name etc.

street2.description: Second line of street address specifying apt, suite etc.

postcode.description: Postal or Zip code of the address.

frequentFlyers.description: List of Frequent Flyer accounts associated with the passenger.

airline.description: Frequent Flyer account airline code (IATA code like http://www.iata.org/about/members/Pages/airline-list.aspx?Alltrue).

membershipLevelTypeCode.description: Frequent Flyer membership level type code.

membershipStartDate.description: Frequent Flyer membership start date in format: YYYY-MM-DD.

userID.description: Auto-generated unique ID of the passenger.

consents.description: List of consent the passenger agreed upon.

maritalStatus.description: Specifies if the passenger is married/unmarried.

hasChildren.description: Flag indicating if the passenger has children.

corporateUser.description: Flag indicating if the passenger is associated with a corporate company.

specialRequests.description: List of Special Service Request (SSR) codes from the passenger's profile.

dateModified.description: Date of the last profile modification in format: YYYY-MM-DD.

profileStatus.description: Flag indicating if profile is active/disabled.

userCreditCards.description: Credit cards associated with the profile.

holderName.description: Credit Card holder name as on card.

prefix.title: Prefix2
prefix.description: Passenger prefix or title, accepts lower and upper case letters (prefix values read from pnr will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

suffix.title: Suffix2
suffix.description: Passenger suffix, accepts lower and upper case letters (suffix values read from the PNR will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

expirationDate.description: Credit Card expiration date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

installmentId.description: Installment ID. Used when installment source in payment options service is PAYMENT_PROVIDER. It should not be present when installment source in payment options service is CONFIGURATION.

bankName.description: Installment bank name. Used when installment source in payment options service is CONFIGURATION. It should not be present when installment source in payment options service is PAYMENT_PROVIDER.

months.description: Selected amount of monthly installments (available options are configurable). Used when installment source in payment options service is CONFIGURATION. It should not be present when installment source in payment options service is PAYMENT_PROVIDER.

countryCode.description: Phone country code (ISO country code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Country_code).

redirectUrlData.title: RedirectUrlData
redirectUrlData.description: Data regarding AFOP or Dynamic 3ds redirection urls, required for the 1st request.

defaultURL.description: Holds the default URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification.

pendingURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification while the operation is pending.

approvedURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when it has been approved.

declinedURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when it has been declined.

errorURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when during the process an error has been encountered.

cancelURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when the operation has been cancelled.

verificationResult.description: Verification Result for 3DS context second pass.

received3rdPartyData.title: Received3rdPartyData
received3rdPartyData.description: Data obtained after returning from 3rd party redirection, required for the 2nd AFOP or Dynamic 3DS request.

mac.description: Secret key used to validate response from the redirect.

smsCode.description: SMS code for card authorization verification.

selectedDCCOffer.title: DCCPaymentOffer
selectedDCCOffer.description: Details of the Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC) offer.

currency.description: Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.
Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.

exchangeRate.description: Exchange rate between the price in the original currency and price in the Credit Card currency (including the marginPercentRate).

exchangeRateSource.description: The source of an exchange rate.

supplierId.description: The merchant providing the dynamic currency conversion service.

items.title: DCCPassengerDocumentDetail
items.description: Dynamic Currency Conversion(DCC) details of the passenger and the passenger’s document.

passengerIndex.description: Index of the passenger expressed as a positive integer.

prefix.title: Prefix2
prefix.description: Passenger prefix or title, accepts lower and upper case letters (prefix values read from pnr will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

suffix.title: Suffix2
suffix.description: Passenger suffix, accepts lower and upper case letters (suffix values read from the PNR will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

dccDocumentDetails.description: Dynamic Conversion(DCC) details of the passenger’s documents.

items.title: DCCDocumentDetail
items.description: Dynamic Currency Conversion(DCC) details of the passenger’s document.

currency.description: Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.
Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.
Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.

issuingCountry.description: Document issue country code (ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1).

countryOfBirth.description: Passenger's country of birth (ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1).

issueDate.description: Document issued date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

nationality.description: Passenger's nationality ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1.

expirationDate.description: Document expiration date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

dateOfBirth.description: Passenger's date of birth in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

industryCode.title: IndustryCode
industryCode.description: Occupation industry code. Values - AGY:Agency Employee, AGR:Agriculture/Forestry/Fishing, ART:Art, BNK:Banking, BUS:Business, BSC:Business Services and Consulting, CON:Construction, CPR:Chemicals/Petroleum Refining, CLG:College Student, EDU:Education, ELC:Electric, ENR:Entertainment and Recreation, FIN:Finance, FDP:Food Processing, GOV:Government, HLT:Health Services, HTL:Hotel, HPS:Household and Personal Service, HSW:Housewife, HRS:Human Resources, INF:Information Technology, INS:Insurance, LGL:Legal, LEI:Leisure and Hospitality, MFG:Manufacturing, MKT:Marketing, MCE:MFG - Computers/Electronics, MCD:MFG - Consumer Durables, MCN:MFG - Consumer Nondurables, MHE:MFG - Heavy Equipment, MIN:Mining, MUS:Music, NNG:Non-Governmental, OGE:Oil/Gas Exploration, POL:Politics, PST:Post Student, PRO:Professional Services, RLE:Real Estate, REL:Religion, RTR:Retail Trade, SCC:Securities and Commodities, SCL:Social, SFT:Software, SPT:Sport, STU:Student, TEL:Telecommunications, TRD:Trade, TRN:Transportation, TVL:Travel, UTL:Utilities, WTD:Wholesale Trade - Durables, WTN:Wholesale Trade - Nondurables, OTH:Other.

company.description: Name of the company where the passenger works.

homeCountryCode.description: Passenger's home country code (ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?titleISO_3166-1).

homeAirportCode.description: Passenger's home airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

autoLogin.description: Flag indicating that the passenger should be logged in to the profile after it is successfully created. This field may be disabled by configuration. In that case, setting this flag to true will result in a validation error.

Parameters.Name: body
Parameters.Description: Profile data required to update an existing user profile

body.title: UpdateProfileRequest
body.description: Profile data required to update an existing user profile

prefix.title: Prefix2
prefix.description: Passenger prefix or title, accepts lower and upper case letters (prefix values read from pnr will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

suffix.title: Suffix2
suffix.description: Passenger suffix, accepts lower and upper case letters (suffix values read from the PNR will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

dateOfBirth.description: Passenger's date of birth in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

redressNumber.description: Redress number is issued to customers as part the TSA's Secure Flight program to speed identification and security clearance. More information available at www.tsa.gov/stakeholders/secure-flight-program.

countryCode.description: Phone country code (ISO country code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Country_code).

street1.description: First line of street address specifying building number, street name etc.

street2.description: Second line of street address specifying apt, suite etc.

postcode.description: Postal or Zip code of the address.

frequentFlyers.description: List of Frequent Flyer accounts associated with the passenger.

airline.description: Frequent Flyer account airline code (IATA code like http://www.iata.org/about/members/Pages/airline-list.aspx?Alltrue).

membershipLevelTypeCode.description: Frequent Flyer membership level type code.

membershipStartDate.description: Frequent Flyer membership start date in format: YYYY-MM-DD.

userID.description: Auto-generated unique ID of the passenger.

consents.description: List of consent the passenger agreed upon.

maritalStatus.description: Specifies if the passenger is married/unmarried.

hasChildren.description: Flag indicating if the passenger has children.

corporateUser.description: Flag indicating if the passenger is associated with a corporate company.

specialRequests.description: List of Special Service Request (SSR) codes from the passenger's profile.

dateModified.description: Date of the last profile modification in format: YYYY-MM-DD.

profileStatus.description: Flag indicating if profile is active/disabled.

userCreditCards.description: Credit cards associated with the profile.

holderName.description: Credit Card holder name as on card.

prefix.title: Prefix2
prefix.description: Passenger prefix or title, accepts lower and upper case letters (prefix values read from pnr will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

suffix.title: Suffix2
suffix.description: Passenger suffix, accepts lower and upper case letters (suffix values read from the PNR will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

expirationDate.description: Credit Card expiration date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

installmentId.description: Installment ID. Used when installment source in payment options service is PAYMENT_PROVIDER. It should not be present when installment source in payment options service is CONFIGURATION.

bankName.description: Installment bank name. Used when installment source in payment options service is CONFIGURATION. It should not be present when installment source in payment options service is PAYMENT_PROVIDER.

months.description: Selected amount of monthly installments (available options are configurable). Used when installment source in payment options service is CONFIGURATION. It should not be present when installment source in payment options service is PAYMENT_PROVIDER.

countryCode.description: Phone country code (ISO country code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Country_code).

redirectUrlData.title: RedirectUrlData
redirectUrlData.description: Data regarding AFOP or Dynamic 3ds redirection urls, required for the 1st request.

defaultURL.description: Holds the default URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification.

pendingURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification while the operation is pending.

approvedURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when it has been approved.

declinedURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when it has been declined.

errorURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when during the process an error has been encountered.

cancelURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when the operation has been cancelled.

verificationResult.description: Verification Result for 3DS context second pass.

received3rdPartyData.title: Received3rdPartyData
received3rdPartyData.description: Data obtained after returning from 3rd party redirection, required for the 2nd AFOP or Dynamic 3DS request.

mac.description: Secret key used to validate response from the redirect.

smsCode.description: SMS code for card authorization verification.

selectedDCCOffer.title: DCCPaymentOffer
selectedDCCOffer.description: Details of the Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC) offer.

currency.description: Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.
Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.

exchangeRate.description: Exchange rate between the price in the original currency and price in the Credit Card currency (including the marginPercentRate).

exchangeRateSource.description: The source of an exchange rate.

supplierId.description: The merchant providing the dynamic currency conversion service.

items.title: DCCPassengerDocumentDetail
items.description: Dynamic Currency Conversion(DCC) details of the passenger and the passenger’s document.

passengerIndex.description: Index of the passenger expressed as a positive integer.

prefix.title: Prefix2
prefix.description: Passenger prefix or title, accepts lower and upper case letters (prefix values read from pnr will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

suffix.title: Suffix2
suffix.description: Passenger suffix, accepts lower and upper case letters (suffix values read from the PNR will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

dccDocumentDetails.description: Dynamic Conversion(DCC) details of the passenger’s documents.

items.title: DCCDocumentDetail
items.description: Dynamic Currency Conversion(DCC) details of the passenger’s document.

currency.description: Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.
Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.
Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.

issuingCountry.description: Document issue country code (ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1).

countryOfBirth.description: Passenger's country of birth (ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1).

issueDate.description: Document issued date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

nationality.description: Passenger's nationality ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1.

expirationDate.description: Document expiration date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

dateOfBirth.description: Passenger's date of birth in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

industryCode.description: Occupation industry code. Values - AGY:Agency Employee, AGR:Agriculture/Forestry/Fishing, ART:Art, BNK:Banking, BUS:Business, BSC:Business Services and Consulting, CON:Construction, CPR:Chemicals/Petroleum Refining, CLG:College Student, EDU:Education, ELC:Electric, ENR:Entertainment and Recreation, FIN:Finance, FDP:Food Processing, GOV:Government, HLT:Health Services, HTL:Hotel, HPS:Household and Personal Service, HSW:Housewife, HRS:Human Resources, INF:Information Technology, INS:Insurance, LGL:Legal, LEI:Leisure and Hospitality, MFG:Manufacturing, MKT:Marketing, MCE:MFG - Computers/Electronics, MCD:MFG - Consumer Durables, MCN:MFG - Consumer Nondurables, MHE:MFG - Heavy Equipment, MIN:Mining, MUS:Music, NNG:Non-Governmental, OGE:Oil/Gas Exploration, POL:Politics, PST:Post Student, PRO:Professional Services, RLE:Real Estate, REL:Religion, RTR:Retail Trade, SCC:Securities and Commodities, SCL:Social, SFT:Software, SPT:Sport, STU:Student, TEL:Telecommunications, TRD:Trade, TRN:Transportation, TVL:Travel, UTL:Utilities, WTD:Wholesale Trade - Durables, WTN:Wholesale Trade - Nondurables, OTH:Other.

company.description: Name of the company where the passenger works.

homeCountryCode.description: Passenger's home country code (ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?titleISO_3166-1).

homeAirportCode.description: Passenger's home airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

items.description: Price breakdown information of an external product for example car, hotel and insurance.

includeInTotal.description: Flag indicating if the amount should be included in the total payable amount in the cart.

label.description: Label for this breakdown element in the form of machine readable or parsable code. Defined per product type so it can be used in translations.

price.title: ApiPrice
price.description: Contains price and alternatives to display.

currency.description: Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.

pricePerUnit.title: ApiPrice
pricePerUnit.description: Contains price and alternatives to display.

currency.description: Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.

breakdownElementAssignment.title: BreakdownElementAssignment
breakdownElementAssignment.description: Assignment to the specific travel part and/or the passenger or passenger's type.

travelPart.title: TravelPart
travelPart.description: Parent class for all travel part data: Segment, ItineraryPart, Itinerary.

itineraryParts.description: List of itinerary parts (legs). In case of the Round Trip flight: SYD - MEL and MEL - SYD, SYD - MEL is one itinerary part.

items.description: Information about ancillary available for a specific flight.
items.title: FlightAncillary

flightAncillaries.description: Contains list of ancillaries available to brand and/or flight.
flightAncillaries.title: FlightAncillaries

awardFare.description: Flag indicating if this segment is an award fare.

segmentOfferInformation.description: Additional offerings information related to segment.
segmentOfferInformation.title: SegmentOfferInformation

aircraftLeaseText.example: ETIHAD ON JET AIRWAYS CONFIGURED AIRCRAFT

airlineCode.description: Marketing airline two letter code (IATA code like http://www.iata.org/about/members/Pages/airline-list.aspx?All=true).

operatingAirlineCode.description: Operating airline two letter code (IATA code like http://www.iata.org/about/members/Pages/airline-list.aspx?All=true).

disclosureAirlineCode.description: Disclosure airline two letter code (IATA code like http://www.iata.org/about/members/Pages/airline-list.aspx?All=true). Code that identifies (discloses) the codeshare airline that operates the flight. This code can be different from the marketing or operating airline codes.

stopAirports.description: Stop airports associated with this flight.

airport.description: Stop airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

arrival.description: Arrival date time (timestamp in the format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS).

departure.description: Departure date time (timestamp in the format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS).

elapsedTime.description: Flight time from departure airport to layover airport expressed in minutes.

duration.description: Time at the stop airport expressed in minutes.

advisories.description: Marketing messages pertaining to the specific flight.

items.description: The Flight Advisory and Marketing Message feature allows airlines to set up advisory or marketing messages and publish them to passengers.
items.title: Advisory

changeOfGauge.description: Flag indicating if this flight has a change of gauge.

origin.description: Origin airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

destination.description: Destination airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

departure.description: Departure date time, this is local to the origin airport (timestamp format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS).

arrival.description: Arrival date time, this is local to the destination airport (timestamp format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS).

code.description: Status code of the segment that is present on the host.

segmentStatus.description: Name of the segment status that is passed to the Digital Connect.

segmentStatusCode.description: Information about segment status in the PNR.
segmentStatusCode.title: SegmentStatusCode

bookingClass.description: Booking class - a single character code (each airline may be different - F and P are usually first class, C and J business and others such as Y, M, B, H, K, Q, L, V, etc. are economy.).

layoverDuration.description: Stops duration for the particular segment.

previouslySelectedBookingClass.description: Booking class which has been changed due to the RBD being sold out between subsequent context search calls.

subjectToGovernmentApproval.description: Flag indicating that this flight is subjected to government approval. Such flights might be cancelled if approval doesn't get through.

passengerIndex.description: Index of the passenger expressed as a positive integer.

prefix.title: Prefix2
prefix.description: Passenger prefix or title, accepts lower and upper case letters (prefix values read from pnr will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

suffix.title: Suffix2
suffix.description: Passenger suffix, accepts lower and upper case letters (suffix values read from the PNR will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

dateOfBirth.description: Passenger's date of birth in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

redressNumber.description: Redress number is issued to customers as part the TSA's Secure Flight program to speed identification and security clearance. More information available at www.tsa.gov/stakeholders/secure-flight-program.

street1.description: First line of street address specifying building number, street name etc.

street2.description: Second line of street address specifying apt, suite etc.

postcode.description: Postal or Zip code of the address.

phones.description: General sales tax (GST) company’s business phones in format supported by Indian Goods and Sales Tax GSTP SSR.

email.description: General sales tax (GST) company’s business email address.

countryCode.description: Phone country code (ISO country code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Country_code).

street2.description: Second line of street address specifying apt, suite etc.

postcode.description: Postal or Zip code of the address.

specialRequests.description: Special Requests selected by the passenger.

frequentFlyer.description: List of Passenger's Frequent Flyer accounts details.

airline.description: Frequent Flyer account airline code (IATA code like http://www.iata.org/about/members/Pages/airline-list.aspx?All=true).

issuingCountry.description: Document issue country code (ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1).

countryOfBirth.description: Passenger's country of birth (ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1).

issueDate.description: Document issued date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

nationality.description: Passenger's nationality ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1.

expirationDate.description: Document expiration date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

passengerType.title: PassengerType2
passengerType.description: Specifies type of the passenger for this breakdown element assignment. Total should be presented for all passengers with this type.

quantity.description: Quantity of the same values existing in this assignment e.g. number of ancillaries with specific code etc.

originalBookingClass.description: Original booking class of the travel part.

originalCabinClass.description: Original cabin class of the travel part.

selectedBookingClass.description: Booking class of the upgraded travel part.

selectedCabinClass.description: Cabin class of the upgraded travel part.

allOf.description: Upgrade information of the travel part.

subElements.description: List of all breakdown prices for this element e.g. if this element is the total for taxes, 'subElements' will contain a list of elements with specific tax codes and corresponding prices.

total.title: ApiPrice
total.description: Contains price and alternatives to display.

body.title: PaymentData
body.description: Payment data required to update a booking.

paymentRequired.description: Flag indicating if payment is required or not.

payment.description: List with used payments. The request should contain at least one instance of /payment.

cancelURL.description: Context parameter - cancel URL.

payerId.description: ID of the payer needed for 2nd PayPal request.

accountNumber.description: Bank account number. Required for ELV transaction.

countryCode.description: Code of the country where the bank is located (two letters ISO country code like : https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1).

sortCode.description: Six digit code that identifies the bank and the branch where account is held. Required for ELV transaction.

bankName.description: The name of account holder's bank.

allOf.description: Code of payment outside of the Digital Connect when using for example BPC.

defaultURL.description: Holds the default URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification.

pendingURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification while the operation is pending.

approvedURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when it has been approved.

declinedURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when it has been declined.

errorURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when during the process an error has been encountered.

cancelURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when the operation has been cancelled.

redirectUrlData.description: Data regarding AFOP or Dynamic 3ds redirection urls, required for the 1st request.

verificationResult.description: Verification Result for 3DS context second pass.

mac.description: Secret key used to validate response from the redirect.

smsCode.description: SMS code for card authorization verification.

months.description: Selected amount of monthly installments (available options are configurable). Used when installment source in payment options service is CONFIGURATION. It should not be present when installment source in payment options service is PAYMENT_PROVIDER.

ipAddress.description: The user IP address passed for the Fraud Check operation.

suffix.title: Suffix2
suffix.description: Passenger suffix, accepts lower and upper case letters (suffix values read from the PNR will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

street2.description: Second line of street address specifying apt, suite etc.

postcode.description: Postal or Zip code of the address.

countryCode.description: Phone country code (ISO country code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Country_code).

email.description: Email address of the logged in user.

tierLevel.description: Logged in user's frequent flyer member level.

tierStatus.description: Logged in user's frequent flyer status.

issueDate.description: Issue date of FF account in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

remarksAndSSRs.title: RemarksAndSSRs
remarksAndSSRs.description: Messages that can be added to the PNR.

remarks.description: List of remarks to be stored in the PNR.

otherServiceInformation.description: List of OSI to be stored in the PNR.

specialServiceRequests.description: List of SSR (Special Service Request) to be stored in the PNR.

items.title: SpecialServiceRequest
items.description: Special Service Request (SSR) to be stored in the PNR.

passengerIndex.description: Index of the passenger associated with the Special Service Request (SSR), expressed as a positive integer.

passengerNameNumber.description: Passenger's name number. Either input passenger name number or passenger index, no need to enter both.

segmentKey.title: SegmentKey
segmentKey.description: Segment key to associate fare rules, seat map segment etc.

origin.description: Origin airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

destination.description: Destination airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

departure.description: Departure date time, in the format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS.

arrival.description: Arrival date time, in the format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS.

profileInput.description: Input information for profile created in the booking path.

create.description: Set to true to create profile during booking.

username.description: User name for user profile create in booking path.

queuePlacementData.title: QueuePlacementData
queuePlacementData.description: Queue number and prefatory instruction code used to place the PNR in a specific queue.

queueNumber.description: Queue number used to specify the required queue.

instructionCode.description: Prefatory instruction code for given queue.

Nodes.Title: Recalculate Product Prices
Nodes.Name: refreshProducts
Nodes.Description: Recalculates products data based on given context

awardSwitchState.title: AwardSwitchState
awardSwitchState.description:
Defines products prices mode: CASH or POINTS. For CASH, products breakdown returned by service will be in cash.
For POINTS, products breakdown will be recalculated to points, if user is logged in and has sufficient balance.
Can be used in B2C flow. Switching to POINTS does not change flow to RBE.

airCustomPricing.title: AirCustomPricing
airCustomPricing.description: Custom pricing details for selected itinerary supporting custom discount at itinerary part/itinerary level, tax override and endorsement text addition to booking.

endorsement.description: Endorsement text which will be added to the booking.

items.title: Tax
items.description: JSON representation of the tax override parameter.

code.description: Code associated with the tax where the tax amount will be overridden.

amount.description: Tax amount which will override the current tax.

items.title: AirItineraryDiscount
items.description: Discount amount/percentage or fixed base fare for the selected itinerary.

origin.description: Origin airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

destination.description: Destination airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

departure.description: Departure date time (timestamp in the format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS).

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: JSON representation of the select flights discount parameter.

baseFare.description: Fixed base fare (excluding taxes) which will replace the original fare.

allOf.description: Fixed base fare (excluding taxes) which will replace the original fare.

amount.description: Discount amount to be applied for the fare.

percentage.description: Discount percentage to be applied for the fare.

reprice.description:
Until now pricing was supported on select flights and in purchase.
This new property (value set to: true/false) in PUT method will allow additional re-price before user enters payment page or any other step in flow.
If it is not provided it will be treated as "false".

Nodes.Title: Return Combinability Mapping
Nodes.Name: getCombinability
Nodes.Description: Returns combinability mapping. This information will allow to display proper payment methods and allow multiple forms of payment. It also provides information which products are paid separatelly so we can provide more flexibility to a user. Query parameter 'by' recieves combinabilityType, accepted values = product, payment

Nodes.Title: Add External Products
Nodes.Name: addToCart
Nodes.Description: To add an external product to the cart

Parameters.Name: body
Parameters.Description: JSON request with external product breakdown information

body.title: AddExternalProductsRequest
body.description: JSON request with external product breakdown information

externalProducts.description: List of external products with breakdown.

items.title: ExternalProduct
items.description: Price breakdown information of an external product for example car, hotel and insurance.

includeInTotal.description: Flag indicating if the amount should be included in the total payable amount in the cart.

label.description: Label for this breakdown element in the form of machine readable or parsable code. Defined per product type so it can be used in translations.

price.title: ApiPrice
price.description: Contains price and alternatives to display.

currency.description: Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.

pricePerUnit.title: ApiPrice
pricePerUnit.description: Contains price and alternatives to display.

currency.description: Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.

breakdownElementAssignment.title: BreakdownElementAssignment
breakdownElementAssignment.description: Assignment to the specific travel part and/or the passenger or passenger's type.

travelPart.title: TravelPart
travelPart.description: Parent class for all travel part data: Segment, ItineraryPart, Itinerary.

itineraryParts.description: List of itinerary parts (legs). In case of the Round Trip flight: SYD - MEL and MEL - SYD, SYD - MEL is one itinerary part.

items.description: Information about ancillary available for a specific flight.
items.title: FlightAncillary

flightAncillaries.description: Contains list of ancillaries available to brand and/or flight.
flightAncillaries.title: FlightAncillaries

awardFare.description: Flag indicating if this segment is an award fare.

segmentOfferInformation.description: Additional offerings information related to segment.
segmentOfferInformation.title: SegmentOfferInformation

aircraftLeaseText.example: ETIHAD ON JET AIRWAYS CONFIGURED AIRCRAFT

airlineCode.description: Marketing airline two letter code (IATA code like http://www.iata.org/about/members/Pages/airline-list.aspx?All=true).

operatingAirlineCode.description: Operating airline two letter code (IATA code like http://www.iata.org/about/members/Pages/airline-list.aspx?All=true).

disclosureAirlineCode.description: Disclosure airline two letter code (IATA code like http://www.iata.org/about/members/Pages/airline-list.aspx?All=true). Code that identifies (discloses) the codeshare airline that operates the flight. This code can be different from the marketing or operating airline codes.

stopAirports.description: Stop airports associated with this flight.

airport.description: Stop airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

arrival.description: Arrival date time (timestamp in the format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS).

departure.description: Departure date time (timestamp in the format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS).

elapsedTime.description: Flight time from departure airport to layover airport expressed in minutes.

duration.description: Time at the stop airport expressed in minutes.

advisories.description: Marketing messages pertaining to the specific flight.

items.description: The Flight Advisory and Marketing Message feature allows airlines to set up advisory or marketing messages and publish them to passengers.
items.title: Advisory

changeOfGauge.description: Flag indicating if this flight has a change of gauge.

origin.description: Origin airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

destination.description: Destination airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

departure.description: Departure date time, this is local to the origin airport (timestamp format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS).

arrival.description: Arrival date time, this is local to the destination airport (timestamp format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS).

code.description: Status code of the segment that is present on the host.

segmentStatus.description: Name of the segment status that is passed to the Digital Connect.

segmentStatusCode.description: Information about segment status in the PNR.
segmentStatusCode.title: SegmentStatusCode

bookingClass.description: Booking class - a single character code (each airline may be different - F and P are usually first class, C and J business and others such as Y, M, B, H, K, Q, L, V, etc. are economy.).

layoverDuration.description: Stops duration for the particular segment.

previouslySelectedBookingClass.description: Booking class which has been changed due to the RBD being sold out between subsequent context search calls.

subjectToGovernmentApproval.description: Flag indicating that this flight is subjected to government approval. Such flights might be cancelled if approval doesn't get through.

passengerIndex.description: Index of the passenger expressed as a positive integer.

prefix.title: Prefix2
prefix.description: Passenger prefix or title, accepts lower and upper case letters (prefix values read from pnr will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

suffix.title: Suffix2
suffix.description: Passenger suffix, accepts lower and upper case letters (suffix values read from the PNR will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

dateOfBirth.description: Passenger's date of birth in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

redressNumber.description: Redress number is issued to customers as part the TSA's Secure Flight program to speed identification and security clearance. More information available at www.tsa.gov/stakeholders/secure-flight-program.

street1.description: First line of street address specifying building number, street name etc.

street2.description: Second line of street address specifying apt, suite etc.

postcode.description: Postal or Zip code of the address.

phones.description: General sales tax (GST) company’s business phones in format supported by Indian Goods and Sales Tax GSTP SSR.

email.description: General sales tax (GST) company’s business email address.

countryCode.description: Phone country code (ISO country code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Country_code).

street1.description: First line of street address specifying building number, street name etc.

street2.description: Second line of street address specifying apt, suite etc.

postcode.description: Postal or Zip code of the address.

specialRequests.description: Special Requests selected by the passenger.

frequentFlyer.description: List of Passenger's Frequent Flyer accounts details.

airline.description: Frequent Flyer account airline code (IATA code like http://www.iata.org/about/members/Pages/airline-list.aspx?All=true).

issuingCountry.description: Document issue country code (ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1).

countryOfBirth.description: Passenger's country of birth (ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1).

issueDate.description: Document issued date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

nationality.description: Passenger's nationality ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1.

expirationDate.description: Document expiration date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

dateOfBirth.description: Passenger's date of birth in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

issuingCountry.description: Document issue country code (ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1).

countryOfBirth.description: Passenger's country of birth (ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1).

issueDate.description: Document issued date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

passengerType.title: PassengerType2
passengerType.description: Specifies type of the passenger for this breakdown element assignment. Total should be presented for all passengers with this type.

quantity.description: Quantity of the same values existing in this assignment e.g. number of ancillaries with specific code etc.

originalBookingClass.description: Original booking class of the travel part.

originalCabinClass.description: Original cabin class of the travel part.

selectedBookingClass.description: Booking class of the upgraded travel part.

selectedCabinClass.description: Cabin class of the upgraded travel part.

allOf.description: Upgrade information of the travel part.

subElements.description: List of all breakdown prices for this element e.g. if this element is the total for taxes, 'subElements' will contain a list of elements with specific tax codes and corresponding prices.

total.title: ApiPrice
total.description: Contains price and alternatives to display.

currency.description: Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.

Nodes.Title: Flight Search
Nodes.Name: search
Nodes.Description: Perform a search of itineraries with the search criteria in a JSON format. The response contains a list of itineraries with fare offerings and detailed price breakdown.

currency.description: Currency that overrides default currency used in search. Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217, or FFCURRENCY for points/miles.

awardBooking.description: Flag indicating if search result should be obtained for an award booking.

promoCodes.description: Promo codes associated with the trip/passengers.

from.title: Location
from.description: Location information. Code may be city or code.

useNearbyLocations.description: Flag indicating if we should use nearby location search.

to.title: Location
to.description: Location information. Code may be city or code.

useNearbyLocations.description: Flag indicating if we should use nearby location search.

date.description: Specific date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

plusMinusDays.description: Number of the alternate pricing days that will be shown in the matrix before and after the selected date. In the format plus/minus 2 days for the matrix 5x5.

pointOfSale.description: Point of Sale denotes the Country from which Sale happens. ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1.

trendIndicator.description: Flag indicating multiple visits to the website.

preferredOperatingCarrier.description: Operating carrier code to be sent to shopping as the preferred one.

Nodes.Title: Get Dynamic Currency Offers
Nodes.Name: retrieveDCCOffer
Nodes.Description: Used when the currency of the booking is different than the currency on which the passenger's credit card is based. It checks if the Credit Card is eligible for the Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC), informs the Payment Web Service that the Digital Connect requests for the dynamic currency conversion offers and retrieves possible DCC (Dynamic Currency Conversion) offers.

currency.description: Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.

payment.description: List of preferred payment/payments for the selected offering.

cancelURL.description: Context parameter - cancel URL.

payerId.description: ID of the payer needed for 2nd PayPal request.

accountNumber.description: Bank account number. Required for ELV transaction.

cancelURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when the operation has been cancelled.

  --url '{% case environment %}{% when 'default' %}https://{% if config["host_and_port"] != nil %}{{ config["host_and_port"] | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}{% else %}{% endif %}/{% if config["api_context_path"] != nil %}{{ config["api_context_path"] | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}{% else %}{% endif %}{% when 'mock' %}https://f7odr7msbeqckh59c-mock.stoplight-proxy.io{% endcase %}/products/obfees/waive{% capture inline_query_capture_876234 %}&jipcc={% if config["storefront"] == nil %}STOREFRONT_ID{% else %}{{ config["storefront"] | url_encode | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}{% endif %}&execution={% if config["execution"] == nil %}EXECUTION_ID{% else %}{{ config["execution"] | url_encode | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}{% endif %}{% endcapture %}{% if inline_query_capture_876234.size > 0 %}?{% endif %}{{ inline_query_capture_876234 | remove_first:'&' }}' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer {{ config["AccessToken"] | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}'\
  -H 'application-id: {{ config["application-id"] | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}'\
  -H 'Accept: application/json'{% if call["args"]["body"] != nil %}\
  -H 'Content-type: application/json'{% endif %}{% if call["args"]["body"] != nil %} \
  --data-raw '{{ call["args"]["body"] | json: true | replace: "'", "'\''" }}'{% endif %}

Templates.HTTP_CURL_V1:
curl -X GET -G \
  --url '{% case environment %}{% when 'default' %}https://{% if config["host_and_port"] != nil %}{{ config["host_and_port"] | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}{% else %}{% endif %}/{% if config["api_context_path"] != nil %}{{ config["api_context_path"] | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}{% else %}{% endif %}{% when 'mock' %}https://f7odr7msbeqckh59c-mock.stoplight-proxy.io{% endcase %}/products/air/search/latest' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer {{ config["AccessToken"] | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}'\
  -H 'application-id: {{ config["application-id"] | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}'\
  -H 'Accept: application/json' \
  -d 'jipcc={% if config["storefront"] == nil %}STOREFRONT_ID{% else %}{{ config["storefront"] | url_encode | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}{% endif %}' \
  -d 'execution={% if config["execution"] == nil %}EXECUTION_ID{% else %}{{ config["execution"] | url_encode | replace: "'", "'\''" | replace: "\n", "\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\r" }}{% endif %}'

currency.description: Currency of the advertised fare that overrides default currency used in search. Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217, or FFCURRENCY for points/miles.

pointOfSale.description: Point of sale denotes the country from which sale happens. ISO country code like: https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1.

currency.description: Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.

promoCodes.description: Promo codes associated with the trip/passengers.

brandId.description: Brand ID code with which the fare is filed. Dependent on the airline fare filing.

marriageGroup.title: MarriageGroup
marriageGroup.description: Marriage group indicator. Default value is 0. Set to 0 means false, set to 1 means true.

segmentOfferInformation.title: SegmentOfferInformation
segmentOfferInformation.description: Additional offerings information related to segment.

flightAncillaries.title: FlightAncillaries
flightAncillaries.description: Contains list of ancillaries available to brand and/or flight.

items.title: FlightAncillary
items.description: Information about ancillary available for a specific flight.

awardFare.description: Flag indicating if this segment is an award fare.

aircraftLeaseText.example: ETIHAD ON JET AIRWAYS CONFIGURED AIRCRAFT

airlineCode.description: Marketing airline two letter code (IATA code like http://www.iata.org/about/members/Pages/airline-list.aspx?All=true).

operatingAirlineCode.description: Operating airline two letter code (IATA code like http://www.iata.org/about/members/Pages/airline-list.aspx?All=true).

disclosureAirlineCode.description: Disclosure airline two letter code (IATA code like http://www.iata.org/about/members/Pages/airline-list.aspx?All=true). Code that identifies (discloses) the codeshare airline that operates the flight. This code can be different from the marketing or operating airline codes.

stopAirports.description: Stop airports associated with this flight.

airport.description: Stop airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

arrival.description: Arrival date time (timestamp in the format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS).

departure.description: Departure date time (timestamp in the format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS).

elapsedTime.description: Flight time from departure airport to layover airport expressed in minutes.

duration.description: Time at the stop airport expressed in minutes.

advisories.description: Marketing messages pertaining to the specific flight.

items.title: Advisory
items.description: The Flight Advisory and Marketing Message feature allows airlines to set up advisory or marketing messages and publish them to passengers.

changeOfGauge.description: Flag indicating if this flight has a change of gauge.

origin.description: Origin airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

destination.description: Destination airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

departure.description: Departure date time, this is local to the origin airport (timestamp format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS).

arrival.description: Arrival date time, this is local to the destination airport (timestamp format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS).

segmentStatusCode.title: SegmentStatusCode
segmentStatusCode.description: Information about segment status in the PNR.

code.description: Status code of the segment that is present on the host.

segmentStatus.title: SegmentStatus
segmentStatus.description: Name of the segment status that is passed to the Digital Connect.

bookingClass.description: Booking class - a single character code (each airline may be different - F and P are usually first class, C and J business and others such as Y, M, B, H, K, Q, L, V, etc. are economy.).

layoverDuration.description: Stops duration for the particular segment.

previouslySelectedBookingClass.description: Booking class which has been changed due to the RBD being sold out between subsequent context search calls.

subjectToGovernmentApproval.description: Flag indicating that this flight is subjected to government approval. Such flights might be cancelled if approval doesn't get through.

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: JSON representation of the select flights discount parameter.

baseFare.description: Fixed base fare (excluding taxes) which will replace the original fare.

allOf.description: Fixed base fare (excluding taxes) which will replace the original fare.

amount.description: Discount amount to be applied for the fare.

percentage.description: Discount percentage to be applied for the fare.

endorsement.description: Endorsement text which will be added to the booking.

items.title: Tax
items.description: JSON representation of the tax override parameter.

code.description: Code associated with the tax where the tax amount will be overridden.

amount.description: Tax amount which will override the current tax.

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: JSON representation of the select flights discount parameter.

baseFare.description: Fixed base fare (excluding taxes) which will replace the original fare.

allOf.description: Fixed base fare (excluding taxes) which will replace the original fare.

amount.description: Discount amount to be applied for the fare.

percentage.description: Discount percentage to be applied for the fare.

Parameters.Name: body
Parameters.Description: Payment data required to purchase a booking.

body.title: PaymentData
body.description: Payment data required to purchase a booking.

paymentRequired.description: Flag indicating if payment is required or not.

payment.description: List with used payments. The request should contain at least one instance of /payment.

cancelURL.description: Context parameter - cancel URL.

payerId.description: ID of the payer needed for 2nd PayPal request.

accountNumber.description: Bank account number. Required for ELV transaction.

countryCode.description: Code of the country where the bank is located (two letters ISO country code like : https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=ISO_3166-1).

sortCode.description: Six digit code that identifies the bank and the branch where account is held. Required for ELV transaction.

bankName.description: The name of account holder's bank.

allOf.description: Code of payment outside of the Digital Connect when using for example BPC.

defaultURL.description: Holds the default URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification.

pendingURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification while the operation is pending.

approvedURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when it has been approved.

declinedURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when it has been declined.

errorURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when during the process an error has been encountered.

cancelURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when the operation has been cancelled.

redirectUrlData.description: Data regarding AFOP or Dynamic 3ds redirection urls, required for the 1st request.
redirectUrlData.title: RedirectUrlData

verificationResult.description: Verification Result for 3DS context second pass.

transactionId.description: Transaction ID associated with this payment.

mac.description: Secret key used to validate response from the redirect.

smsCode.description: SMS code for card authorization verification.

received3rdPartyData.description: Data obtained after returning from 3rd party redirection, required for the 2nd AFOP or Dynamic 3DS request.
received3rdPartyData.title: Received3rdPartyData

allOf.description: Third party redirect return payment class. It is to reuse previous payment data sent so that pure browser UI won't have to handle PCI sensitive data.

transactionId.description: Transaction ID associated with this payment.

mac.description: Secret key used to validate response from the redirect.

smsCode.description: SMS code for card authorization verification.

received3rdPartyData.description: Data obtained after returning from 3rd party redirection, required for the 2nd AFOP or Dynamic 3DS request.
received3rdPartyData.title: Received3rdPartyData

allOf.description: Second Payment request with additional data and sms code.

homePageUrl.description: Poli context parameter - home page URL.

token.description: Token required for the 2nd poli request.

allOf.description: Code of payment outside of the Digital Connect in a retail location like bank.

birthDate.description: Purchaser's birth date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

postcode.description: Purchaser's postcode.

issuer.description: Financial institution issuing the form of payment. Used for payments with 3DS cards.

fopCode.description: Form of payment code for Alternative form of payment (AFOP) which identifies the AFOP Category.

fopSubcode.description: Form of payment subcode for Alternative form of payment (AFOP) which identifies the actual AFOP.

defaultURL.description: Holds the default URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification.

pendingURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification while the operation is pending.

approvedURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when it has been approved.

declinedURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when it has been declined.

errorURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when during the process an error has been encountered.

cancelURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when the operation has been cancelled.

redirectUrlData.description: Data regarding AFOP or Dynamic 3ds redirection urls, required for the 1st request.
redirectUrlData.title: RedirectUrlData

mac.description: Secret key used to validate response from the redirect.

smsCode.description: SMS code for card authorization verification.

received3rdPartyData.description: Data obtained after returning from 3rd party redirection, required for the 2nd AFOP or Dynamic 3DS request.
received3rdPartyData.title: Received3rdPartyData

holderName.description: Credit Card holder name as on card.

prefix.description: Passenger prefix or title, accepts lower and upper case letters (prefix values read from pnr will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

suffix.description: Passenger suffix, accepts lower and upper case letters (suffix values read from the PNR will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

expirationDate.description: Credit Card expiration date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

installmentId.description: Installment ID. Used when installment source in payment options service is PAYMENT_PROVIDER. It should not be present when installment source in payment options service is CONFIGURATION.

bankName.description: Installment bank name. Used when installment source in payment options service is CONFIGURATION. It should not be present when installment source in payment options service is PAYMENT_PROVIDER.

months.description: Selected amount of monthly installments (available options are configurable). Used when installment source in payment options service is CONFIGURATION. It should not be present when installment source in payment options service is PAYMENT_PROVIDER.

countryCode.description: Phone country code (ISO country code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Country_code).

defaultURL.description: Holds the default URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification.

pendingURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification while the operation is pending.

approvedURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when it has been approved.

declinedURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when it has been declined.

errorURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when during the process an error has been encountered.

cancelURL.description: Holds the URL where the client would like to post the result of the 3rd party verification when the operation has been cancelled.

redirectUrlData.description: Data regarding AFOP or Dynamic 3ds redirection urls, required for the 1st request.
redirectUrlData.title: RedirectUrlData

verificationResult.description: Verification Result for 3DS context second pass.

mac.description: Secret key used to validate response from the redirect.

smsCode.description: SMS code for card authorization verification.

received3rdPartyData.description: Data obtained after returning from 3rd party redirection, required for the 2nd AFOP or Dynamic 3DS request.
received3rdPartyData.title: Received3rdPartyData

currency.description: Currency - Three letter ISO code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 or 'FFCURRENCY' for points/miles.

exchangeRateSource.description: The source of an exchange rate.

supplierId.description: The merchant providing the dynamic currency conversion service.

passengerIndex.description: Index of the passenger expressed as a positive integer.

prefix.description: Passenger prefix or title, accepts lower and upper case letters (prefix values read from pnr will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

suffix.description: Passenger suffix, accepts lower and upper case letters (suffix values read from the PNR will be in upper case letters to accommodate this, upper case is also accepted).

dccDocumentDetails.description: Dynamic Conversion(DCC) details of the passenger’s documents.

expDate.description: Expiration date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD. Required for GIFT_CARD.

street1.description: First line of street address.

countryCode.description: Phone country code (ISO country code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Country_code).

fraudNetData.title: FraudNetData
fraudNetData.description: Additional data about the user browser, used by Fraud check providers to validate transaction.

timestamp.description: Point of Sale date and time of the purchase passed for the Fraud check operation in format: YYYY-MM-DD.

ipAddress.description: The user IP address passed for the Fraud Check operation.

suffix.title: Suffix2

street2.description: Second line of street address specifying apt, suite etc.

postcode.description: Postal or Zip code of the address.

email.description: Email address of the logged in user.

tierLevel.description: Logged in user's frequent flyer member level.

issueDate.description: Issue date of FF account in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

segmentKey.title: SegmentKey

Nodes.Title: Recalculate Product Prices
Nodes.Name: refreshProducts
Nodes.Description: Recalculates products data based on given context

awardSwitchState.title: AwardSwitchState
awardSwitchState.description:
Defines products prices mode: CASH or POINTS. For CASH, products breakdown returned by service will be in cash.
For POINTS, products breakdown will be recalculated to points, if user is logged in and has sufficient balance.
Can be used in B2C flow. Switching to POINTS does not change flow to RBE.

airCustomPricing.title: AirCustomPricing
airCustomPricing.description: Custom pricing details for selected itinerary supporting custom discount at itinerary part/itinerary level, tax override and endorsement text addition to booking.

endorsement.description: Endorsement text which will be added to the booking.

items.title: Tax
items.description: JSON representation of the tax override parameter.

code.description: Code associated with the tax where the tax amount will be overridden.

amount.description: Tax amount which will override the current tax.

items.title: AirItineraryDiscount
items.description: Discount amount/percentage or fixed base fare for the selected itinerary.

origin.description: Origin airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

destination.description: Destination airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

departure.description: Departure date time (timestamp in the format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS).

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: JSON representation of the select flights discount parameter.

baseFare.description: Fixed base fare (excluding taxes) which will replace the original fare.

allOf.description: Fixed base fare (excluding taxes) which will replace the original fare.

amount.description: Discount amount to be applied for the fare.

percentage.description: Discount percentage to be applied for the fare.

reprice.description:
Until now pricing was supported on select flights and in purchase.
This new property (value set to: true/false) in PUT method will allow additional re-price before user enters payment page or any other step in flow.
If it is not provided it will be treated as "false".

body.title: FlightSelectionOptions
body.description: Provides additional options during flight selection.

airCustomPricing.title: AirCustomPricing
airCustomPricing.description: Custom pricing details for selected itinerary supporting custom discount at itinerary part/itinerary level, tax override and endorsement text addition to booking.

endorsement.description: Endorsement text which will be added to the booking.

items.title: Tax
items.description: JSON representation of the tax override parameter.

code.description: Code associated with the tax where the tax amount will be overridden.

amount.description: Tax amount which will override the current tax.

items.title: AirItineraryDiscount
items.description: Discount amount/percentage or fixed base fare for the selected itinerary.

origin.description: Origin airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

destination.description: Destination airport code (IATA 3 letter code like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airports_by_IATA_code:_A).

departure.description: Departure date time (timestamp in the format: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:MM:SS).

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: JSON representation of the select flights discount parameter.

baseFare.description: Fixed base fare (excluding taxes) which will replace the original fare.

allOf.description: Fixed base fare (excluding taxes) which will replace the original fare.

amount.description: Discount amount to be applied for the fare.

percentage.description: Discount percentage to be applied for the fare.

failureReason.description: Cause of the failed authorization operation.

priority.description:
The reason for providing warning for "priority" ancillaries. 
The airline - based on the JSON-s warning/response - is able to distinguish between standard and priority ancillaries (e.g. paid special assistance set up as ancillary) and inform passenger accordingly on the UI.
